summary: App update: localize UI to Bangla, switch currency to BDT with a specific top-up credit rule, and adjust ad system to remove the 30-second delay and load ads from a provided script/direct link.
architectural_notes: App must support full Bangla (BN) localization across all screens/text.
Wallet/top-up logic must implement mapping: BDT 1000 purchase => +8 BDT balance credit.
Ad loading must support rendering ads from an externally provided script/direct link (no delay).

existing_features.title: Localize the entire frontend UI to Bangla (bn-BD), including page titles, buttons, form labels/placeholders, toasts, alerts, empty states, and validation/error messages across Earn/Finance/E‑Service/Profile/Admin flows.
Switch all money/balance displays and money input labels from USD to BDT across the app UI, using the ৳ symbol and Bangla locale formatting where appropriate.

Implement the tap-to-earn conversion rule: when the user claims tap-to-earn coins, each 1000 taps/coins adds 8 BDT to the user account balance, and any remainder taps/coins that do not make a full 1000 are preserved for future claiming.
Remove the previously implemented 30-second delay from the Tap-to-Earn ad triggering flow so that when an ad threshold is reached, the interstitial ad shows immediately (no countdown/pending state).

Update the Tap-to-Earn ad interstitial to load and display ads from the user-provided ad script and direct ad link (external), replacing the current self-hosted static ad creative inventory for ad content rendering.

new_feature_requests.summary: Localize the entire app language to Bangla (BN).
Update currency to BDT and apply top-up rule: tapping BDT 1000 adds 8 BDT to user balance.
Remove the previously added 30-second ad delay and load/show ads directly from the provided ad script/direct link.

projectName: Localize UI to Bangla, switch currency to BDT with tap-to-earn conversion, and update ad system to remove delay + show ads from provided script/link
